entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
